confirmed_facts: Seoul Dragon City opened a strawberry buffet called â€˜Strawberry Studioâ€™ at its Ibis Styles Ambassador buffet restaurant â€˜InStyleâ€™ on 2025â€‘11â€‘29.

The buffet features 26 international strawberry desserts and 24 food items, including a â€˜Fresh Strawberry Towerâ€™, â€˜Waraabi Mochi Parfaitâ€™, â€˜Strawberry Marquezitaâ€™, â€˜Strawberry Pandoorâ€™, and â€˜Strawberry Ball Deniâ€™.
The buffet operates on weekends and public holidays from 12:00â€‘14:45, 14:45â€‘17:30, and 18:00â€‘21:00, with a dinnerâ€‘only slot on Fridays.
Adult price is KRW 110,000 per person; children aged 6â€‘12 pay KRW 60,000.

Walkerhill Hotel & Resort is running a â€˜Lovely Strawberryâ€™ promotion featuring 14 strawberry desserts in a 3â€‘tier tray, including â€˜Berry Gardenâ€™, â€˜Ruby Berry Ribbon Mousseâ€™, and â€˜Berry in Beagleâ€™.
